page.title: 06Biography Mr PHILLIPS
page.content: In Magor there is a man who works renovating old cars,motor bikes and antiques.His name is Mr Phillips,he works most of the time renovating old cars.He has got a Lagonda which he renovated for himself to drive for his own pleasure. He works and lives in Magor and has been doing so for six years.Before he set up his own business in Magor he was the Manager of a Renault factory in Newport.He is married and has two daughters who come to Magor school. He has renovated old cars for the famous,like Sir Richard Llewellyn and Lord Raglan.He said the most difficult part when renovating is the dry stage,this means stripping the car of paint,spraying and bolting it back together,bit by bit.He often has to send abroad for parts which are hard to come by in this country.
